steps.title: Draw a line under the oval.
steps.content: Draw a line under the oval.

steps.title: Add another line.
steps.content: Add another line. This one should be almost perpendicular to the one you drew in the previous step.

steps.title: Draw a third line.
steps.content: Draw a third line. This one should be parallel to the one you drew in the previous step.

steps.title: Add a fist.
steps.content: Add a fist. You can also take this time to draw a shoulder.

steps.title: Add details.
steps.content: Add details. Taper the ends of the oval and draw lines to give the illusion of muscle.

steps.title: Finish the illustration in permanent media.
steps.content: Finish the illustration in permanent media. Use ink or paint. Erase unnecessary guidelines.
